New Records: Cape Verde became the first team to reach the last 16 at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations after defeating Mozambique 3-0 on January 19, 2024.
Key Match Events: Bebe scored a dipping 30-yard free-kick that bamboozled Mozambique goalkeeper Ernan Siluane,
Ryan Mendes doubled the Blue Sharks' advantage after dispossessing Edmilson Dove and firing home from the edge of the box.
Kevin Pina sealed the victory with a superlative strike into the top corner from outside the box.
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde captain Ryan Mendes said, 'I don't know how far we can go. Now we are into the last 16 and we just need to keep working as we have been.'
Bebe, who plays for Rayo Vallecano in Spain, was praised for his performance, including a free-kick from 40 meters out.
